short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use less energy by viewing your favourite eco-friendly search engine, Ecosia, in dark mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darker colours use less energy to display on a screen and so for the ultimate eco-friendly search option switch to Ecosia dark mode.
